entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Flurries ending overnight then cloudy. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 20.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 20. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023
